title: Azir auto attack bug
body:
Whenever I attacked with my sand soldiers it would try to send me to places instead of auto attacking. This includes minions and champions.
{{champion:268}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3020}} {{item:1056}}  These were the items and summoner spells i was using. I was against a {{champion:236}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:254}}

replies.body: This should be resolved with the updated patch. Are you still experiencing this?
The bug is fixed thank you very much.
